channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Remote Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Remote Service

item.title: CVE-2022-44608|2024-08-03T13:54:03.975Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in Cybozu Remote Service 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to consume huge storage space, which may result in a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-26838|2024-08-03T05:11:44.596Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Importing Mobile Device Data of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
